about_the_game:
Voidseekers is a 1-4 player, online co-op, sci-fi horror shooter. Explore abandoned ships in deep space and search for the equipment and supplies you'll need to complete your mission. But beware, the more active you are, the more the things in the dark take notice, and the harder your job becomes...

FEATURES

  • 1-4 player co-op
    Play alone or join your friends and work together as a crew. Watch each other's backs and make sure no one gets left behind.
  • Sneak
    Go in quietly and try to sneak your way past the sleepers as you prepare your defenses. Find what you can while the silence lasts, but be prepared for trouble.
  • Shoot
    Once it's time to go loud, blast your way through hordes of entities from the void with a variety of weapons. Manage your ammo carefully as your foes grow more numerous and the threat escalates.
  • Salvage
    Explore a variety of maps from massive cargo freighters to compact transports as you search for the vital supplies you'll need. Find keycards to gain access to new areas of the ship, unlock the armory to equip yourself with weapons and ammo, and get the engines running to help hold back the darkness.
  • Survive
    Your activities draw the attention of the things that seek in the dark. Difficulty ramps up as you complete your tasks, and you'll need to stay alert and know when to hide, when to run, and when to fight if you hope to survive.
  • Complete the mission
    There's only one way to close the breach and stop the corruption from spreading. Once you've got everything you can, it's time to detonate the ship. Hold out against the endless horde while you arm the charges, then fight your way back to the shuttle to make it home alive before the charges blow.

IN DEVELOPMENT

This game is still in development. Some features and visuals may be subject to change. This page will update to reflect that as development continues and features are added/expanded.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains frightening imagery and sci-fi violence. Corpses and blood may be seen in the environment.

name: Voidseekers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Voidseekers is a 1-4 player co-op horror FPS. Shoot, salvage, and survive as you explore corrupted ships in deep space. Get in, take what you can, and destroy the ship to contain the breach, but beware the horrors that seek in the void.
